Summary: Glowing humanoid step out of ball.
divs: Sighting Detailsi got up in the middle of the night to see a glow out side my window it was bright but i could look at it without pain then it went black ..........the next day i went to a hypnatist and he helped me remember it all i i saw a gray shot skinny person and a small dog type alein step out and say do u want to know everything i said yes so i went with him i learned their languag i learned how to build a ufo or real name mx89645kl is the model they taught me how to make they taught me how to make a personal teleporter then they braught me home then wiped my memory of everything that happend in those 9 years it is still a little blury thou.
